name: /r/furry - the visual novel
description:
THE GAME IS FREE, I JUST DIDNT KNOW HOW TO REMOVE THE PWYW. (donate if you like tho ;)))

Also note: Didn't think I'd have to say this but THIS IS NOT AIMED AT ANYONE OR ANYTHING. This is just a bit of fun I made in the livestream, I'm not dissing anyone's project. Thank you.

A TERRIBLE VISUAL NOVEL CREATED IN 2 HOURS. A LITERAL SHITPOST. YOU GUYS ASKED FOR THIS.

Hey, thanks for checking out the project. /r/furry the visual novel is a parody visual novel created in renpy during a livestream, to illustrate how easy it is for someone to create a furry visual novel. I believe every visual novel needs something to set it apart from the rest as they require zero programming knowledge.

I hope you enjoy this atrocity parody for free. You can donate if you want, I guess, but please don't. I'll feel terrible, this thing is trash!

Im working on a video from the livestream <3

Love - /u/neonthewolf

Telegram: @YukiLlaveneres

https://redd.it/5uhms4
